verses.verse: <S%H2896>Better<s%> is the <S%H7326>poor<s%> who <S%H1980>walks<s%> in his <S%H8537>integrity<s%> than he who is <S%H6141>perverse<s%> in his <S%H8193>lips<s%> and is a <S%H3684>fool.<s%>
It <S%H2896>isn't<s%> good to have <S%H5315>zeal<s%> without <S%H1847>knowledge;<s%> nor being <S%H213>hasty<s%> with <S%H7272>one<s%>'s feet and missing the <S%H2398>way.<s%>
The <S%H200>foolishness<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H5557>subverts<s%> his <S%H1870>way;<s%> his <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H2196>rages<s%> against <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>
<S%H1952>Wealth<s%> <S%H3254>adds<s%> <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H7453>friends,<s%> but the <S%H1800>poor<s%> is <S%H6504>separated<s%> from his <S%H7453>friend.<s%>
A <S%H8267>false<s%> <S%H5707>witness<s%> shall not be <S%H5352>unpunished.<s%> He who <S%H6315>pours<s%> out <S%H3577>lies<s%> shall not go <S%H4422>free.<s%>
<S%H7227>Many<s%> will <S%H2470>entreat<s%> the <S%H6440>favor<s%> of a <S%H5081>ruler,<s%> and everyone is a <S%H7453>friend<s%> to a <S%H376>man<s%> who gives <S%H4976>gifts.<s%>

All the <S%H251>relatives<s%> of the <S%H7326>poor<s%> <S%H8130>shun<s%> <S%H4828>him:<s%> how much more do his friends <S%H7368>avoid<s%> <S%H7291>him!<s%> He pursues them with <S%H561>pleas,<s%> but they are gone.
He who <S%H7069>gets<s%> <S%H3820>wisdom<s%> <S%H157>loves<s%> his own <S%H5315>soul.<s%> He who <S%H8104>keeps<s%> <S%H8394>understanding<s%> shall <S%H4672>find<s%> <S%H2896>good.<s%>
A <S%H8267>false<s%> <S%H5707>witness<s%> shall not be <S%H5352>unpunished.<s%> He who <S%H6315>utters<s%> <S%H3577>lies<s%> shall <S%H6>perish.<s%>
<S%H8588>Delicate<s%> living is not <S%H5000>appropriate<s%> for a <S%H3684>fool,<s%> much less for a <S%H5650>servant<s%> to have <S%H4910>rule<s%> over <S%H8269>princes.<s%>
The <S%H7922>discretion<s%> of a <S%H120>man<s%> makes him <S%H748>slow<s%> to <S%H639>anger.<s%> It is his <S%H8597>glory<s%> to <S%H5674>overlook<s%> an <S%H6588>offense.<s%>
The <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H2197>wrath<s%> is like the <S%H5099>roaring<s%> of a <S%H3715>lion,<s%> but his <S%H7522>favor<s%> is like <S%H2919>dew<s%> on the <S%H6212>grass.<s%>
A <S%H3684>foolish<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%> is the <S%H1942>calamity<s%> of his <S%H1>father.<s%> A <S%H802>wife<s%>'s <S%H4079>quarrels<s%> are a <S%H2956>continual<s%> <S%H1812>dripping.<s%>
<S%H1004>House<s%> and <S%H1952>riches<s%> are an <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> from <S%H1>fathers,<s%> but a <S%H7919>prudent<s%> <S%H802>wife<s%> is from <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>
<S%H6103>Slothfulness<s%> <S%H5307>casts<s%> into a deep <S%H8639>sleep.<s%> The <S%H7423>idle<s%> <S%H5315>soul<s%> shall suffer <S%H7456>hunger.<s%>
He who <S%H8104>keeps<s%> the <S%H4687>commandment<s%> <S%H8104>keeps<s%> his <S%H5315>soul,<s%> but he who is <S%H959>contemptuous<s%> in his <S%H1870>ways<s%> shall <S%H4191>die.<s%>
He who has <S%H2603>pity<s%> on the <S%H1800>poor<s%> <S%H3867>lends<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh;<s%> he <S%H1576>will<s%> reward <S%H7999>him.<s%>
<S%H3256>Discipline<s%> your <S%H1121>son,<s%> for there <S%H3426>is<s%> <S%H8615>hope;<s%> <S%H5315>don't<s%> be a willing <S%H5375>party<s%> to his <S%H4191>death.<s%>
A <S%H1632>hot<s%> - <S%H2534>tempered<s%> <S%H1419>man<s%> must <S%H5375>pay<s%> the <S%H6066>penalty,<s%> for if you <S%H5337>rescue<s%> <S%H3254>him,<s%> you must do it again.
<S%H8085>Listen<s%> to <S%H6098>counsel<s%> and <S%H6901>receive<s%> <S%H4148>instruction,<s%> that you may be <S%H2449>wise<s%> in your latter <S%H319>end.<s%>
There are <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H4284>plans<s%> in a <S%H376>man<s%>'s <S%H3820>heart,<s%> but <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%>'s <S%H6098>counsel<s%> will <S%H6965>prevail.<s%>
That which makes a <S%H120>man<s%> to be <S%H8378>desired<s%> is his <S%H2617>kindness.<s%> A poor <S%H7326>man<s%> is <S%H2896>better<s%> <S%H376>than<s%> a <S%H3577>liar.<s%>
The <S%H3374>fear<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> leads to <S%H2416>life,<s%> then <S%H7649>contentment;<s%> he <S%H3885>rests<s%> and will not be <S%H6485>touched<s%> by <S%H7451>trouble.<s%>
The <S%H6102>sluggard<s%> <S%H2934>buries<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> in the <S%H6747>dish;<s%> he will not so much as <S%H7725>bring<s%> it to his <S%H6310>mouth<s%> <S%H7725>again.<s%>

<S%H5221>Flog<s%> a <S%H3887>scoffer,<s%> and the <S%H6612>simple<s%> will learn <S%H6191>prudence;<s%> <S%H3198>rebuke<s%> one who has <S%H995>understanding,<s%> and he will <S%H995>gain<s%> <S%H1847>knowledge.<s%>
He who <S%H7703>robs<s%> his <S%H1>father<s%> and drives <S%H1272>away<s%> his <S%H517>mother,<s%> is a <S%H1121>son<s%> who causes <S%H954>shame<s%> and brings <S%H2659>reproach.<s%>
If you <S%H2308>stop<s%> <S%H8085>listening<s%> to <S%H4148>instruction,<s%> my <S%H1121>son,<s%> you will <S%H7686>stray<s%> from the <S%H561>words<s%> of <S%H1847>knowledge.<s%>
A <S%H1100>corrupt<s%> <S%H5707>witness<s%> <S%H3887>mocks<s%> <S%H4941>justice,<s%> and the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H1104>gulps<s%> down <S%H7563>iniquity.<s%>
<S%H8201>Penalties<s%> are <S%H3559>prepared<s%> for <S%H3887>scoffers,<s%> and <S%H4112>beatings<s%> for the <S%H1460>backs<s%> of <S%H3684>fools.<s%>
